titles.title: Worthy of glory and worthy of honor

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worthy of glory and worthy of honor
And worthy of praise is He.
Worthy of glory and worthy of honor
And worthy of praise is He.
He has redeemed me by the blood of the Lamb.
He set my spirit free.
Worthy of glory and worthy of honor
And worthy of praise is He.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are the words and the music.
You are the song that I sing.
You are the melody, You are the harmony.
Praise to Your name I will bring.
You are Almighty God, You are the
Lord of lords, You are the King of kings.
Now I return to You the song that You gave to me.
You are the song that I sing.
